t: Amazon’s expansion in Europe | European Foundation for the Improvement of Living and Working Conditions
s: The U.S. online retail giant Amazon is investing heavily in Europe, creating 11,580 jobs in 2018 alone. As Europe turns towards e-commerce, automation and digitalisation, Amazon will play a key role in reshaping the retail sector.
